attributes.action: consider with Lancashire County Council and Network Rail the building of a railway station at Cottam in Preston
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cottam is a growing residential area within Preston, with a large Sports Arena used by thousands of aspiring athletes every year. The busy Preston - Blackpool railway line runs through it. 

With increasing use of cars in the area a  railway station, whilst expensive, would relieve a lot of commuter delays on a popular, busy route.
